TestCase.name: testOrderByFetch
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a, b DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], proctime=[$3], rowtime=[$4]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(proctime) AS proctime, rowtime], changelogMode=[I,UA,D]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a ASC, b DESC], offset=[0], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastStrategy], changelogMode=[I,UA,D]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single], changelogMode=[I]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime], changelogMode=[I])

Calc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(proctime) AS proctime, rowtime], changelogMode=[I,UA,D]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a ASC, b DESC], offset=[0], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastStrategy], changelogMode=[I,UA,D]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single], changelogMode=[I]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime], changelogMode=[I])
